memberdef.name: DEFAULT
memberdef.initializer: = ([Tiles.GRASS if randint(0, 8) == 0 else Tiles.PLAINS for x in range(2048)] + [Tiles.DIRT if randint(0, 10) == 0 else Tiles.PLAINS for x in range(1024)] + [Tiles.DIRT if randint(0, 8) == 0 else Tiles.COBBLESTONE for x in range(2048)])
